dateOfBirth.label: What is your date of birth?

errors.missingDay: Date of birth must include a day
errors.missingMonth: Date of birth must include a month
errors.missingYear: Date of birth must include a year
errors.missingDayAndMonth: Date of birth must include a day and a month
errors.missingDayAndYear: Date of birth must include a day and a year
errors.missingMonthAndYear: Date of birth must include a month and a year
errors.badFormatYear: Enter your date of birth with a year in the right format, for example 2001 not 01
errors.notReal: Enter a real date of birth
errors.notRealDigits: Enter a real date of birth using only digits
errors.outOfRange: Date of birth must be in the past
